mapper.update:
update course
event_name=#{eventName},
name=#{name},
url=#{url},
start_time=#{startTime},
end_time=#{endTime},
duration=#{duration},
where 1=1
and id = #{id}

update sbu_course
assign_seats=#{assignSeats},
assign_pmds=#{assignPmds},
duration=#{duration},
seats=#{seats},
swap_seats=#{swapSeats},
pmds=#{pmds},
where 1=1
and id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select d.name lbps_name, d.email, e.sbu_name sbu_name, a.event_name, a.name, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.duration, b.seats, b.pmds, b.assign_seats, (b.seats-b.assign_seats) remainning_seats, b.assign_pmds, (b.pmds-b.assign_pmds) remainning_pmds from course a left join sbu_course b on a.id = b.course_id left join sbu_lbps c on b.sbu_id = c.sbu_id left join lbps d on c.lbps_id=d.id left join sbu e on b.sbu_id=e.id
where TIMESTAMPDIFF(WEEK,a.start_time,NOW())=#{week} and d.name is not null and d.email is not null and b.assign_seats != b.seats

SELECT distinct event_name FROM course where 1=1
and end_time < sysdate()
and start_time < TIMESTAMPADD(WEEK,2, sysdate()) and end_time>sysdate()
and start_time > TIMESTAMPADD(WEEK,2, sysdate())
